String.string: We'll impose a death tax on them. Hah!
All coins will go to the families of soldiers who died on the battlefield.
Eliminate Killian's mercenaries in Shriekaal Hall and collect their gold coins. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring the mercenaries' gold coins to Asena at the Furnace Approach.
